sense.gloss: Shōki the Plague-Queller, Zhong Kui, traditional Chinese deity said to prevent plagues and ward off evil and reputedly able to command 80,000 demons
small statue of Shōki the Plague-Queller (placed on the overhang of traditional houses in parts of Kyoto and Nara)
traditional Chinese cold remedy (a medical powder with antipyretic and diaphoretic effects)
